definitions: tour rural districts giving theatrical performances, originally often in barns

examples.text: he barnstormed up and down both coasts and eventually played New York

shortDefinitions: tour rural districts giving theatrical performances

definitions: make a rapid tour of an area as part of a political campaign

examples.text: he was barnstorming down in Georgia
the speech he gives as he barnstorms the country

shortDefinitions: make rapid tour of area as part of political campaign

definitions: travel around giving exhibitions of flying and performing aeronautical stunts

examples.text: barnstorming had become a popular occupation among many trained pilots

shortDefinitions: travel around giving exhibitions of flying and performing aeronautical stunts
